file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 75-31-02-04 - COMPRESSOR-ACCELERATION-BLEED CONTROL VALVE ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COMPRESSOR-ACCELERATION-BLEED CONTROL VALVE ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-75-019 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the compressor-acceleration-bleed control valve assembly. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH engines. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COMPRESSOR-ACCELERATION-BLEED PRE-MOD. S.B. 75-31-02-000-801-A CONTROL VALVE ASSEMBLY - REMOV- AE3007A-75-019 AL COMPRESSOR-ACCELERATION-BLEED PRE-MOD. S.B. 75-31-02-400-801-A CONTROL VALVE ASSEMBLY - INSTAL- AE3007A-75-019 LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 75-31-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 75-31-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-75-019 2. COMPRESSOR-ACCELERATION-BLEED CONTROL VALVE ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) To remove the compressor-acceleration-bleed control valve assembly, obey the instructions in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Engine work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THE ENGINE START/STOP SWITCH IS IN THE “OFF” POSITION TO PREVENT AN ACCIDENTAL ENGINE OPERATION. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – POWERPLANT START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 75-31-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the compressor-acceleration-bleed control valve assembly. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 75-31-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 75-31-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-75-019 3. COMPRESSOR-ACCELERATION-BLEED CONTROL VALVE ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To install the compressor-acceleration-bleed control valve assembly, obey the instructions in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task Engine work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the compressor-acceleration-bleed control valve assembly. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 75-31-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the workstand. (3) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close the applicable circuit breakers. • POWERPLANT START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 75-31-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
